interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Columbo - The Complete Second Season
Review Date: 2012/02/16
Store: Peter Falk  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Product Description', '"Oh, there\'s just one more thing…." Everyone\'s favorite cigar-chomping, trenchcoat-wearing Police Lieutenant is back on DVD asking all the right questions in all 8 thrilling episodes of the Complete Second Season of Columbo. Join five-time Emmy winner Peter Falk as wry and ruffled Lieutenant Columbo as he solves L.A.\'s most puzzling crimes with his trademark wit and style. Along for the chase are a dazzling lineup of Hollywood\'s brightest stars including Robert Culp, Valerie Harper, Dean Stockwell, Leonard Nimoy, Martin Landau, Marc Singer and more. In the smart, funny and exciting Second Season of Columbo, it\'s no mystery to see why this is the DVD series that mystery lovers have been waiting for!', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', 'Armchair sleuths, get out your trenchcoats: Universal has released the sophomore season (1972-73) of the classic detective series', 'Columbo', ", starring Peter Falk as the sage but rumpled police lieutenant. As with the first season, there's plenty of star power in front of and behind the camera to abet Falk in these eight 90- and 120-minute episodes: John Cassavetes stars in the season premiere,", 'Etude in Black', ', as a philandering symphony conductor, with Blythe Danner and Hollywood legend Myrna Loy in support; Oscar winner Ray Milland is a scheming orchid grower in "The Greenhouse Jungle," co-starring Bradford Dillman and William Smith; Robert Culp and Dean Stockwell are a football team manager and owner, respectively, whose disagreements blossom into murder in "The Most Crucial Game"; and Jeanette Nolan offers stellar comic relief in "Double Shock," which features Martin Landau as identical twins--one of whom has murdered their uncle. Performances by Richard Basehart, Laurence Harvey, Leonard Nimoy, Anne Francis, Anne Baxter, and Mel Ferrer also highlight the season; direction by small-screen stalwarts like Boris Sagal, Jeremy Paul Kagan, and Nicholas Colasanto ("Coach" on', 'Cheers', ') and scripts by Stephen Bochco also bring quality and style to the proceedings. Sadly, no extras are available in this five-disc set, but the stellar image and sound quality (and lack of commercials) should appeal to series fans and newcomers alike.', '--Paul Gaita']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Mystery & Suspense', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Peter Falk', 'Language': 'Unqualified, Unknown (Dolby Digital 2.0), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono)', 'Number Of Discs': '4', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 6 x 1 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2220369', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '10 hours and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 8, 2005', 'Actors': 'Peter Falk', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '4'}
Review Text: To start off I love colu.mbo,and my dvd even though used it looked new and played great.overall a-1.this is one of my favo.rite seasons of columbo
Review Title: Great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Columbo - The Complete Second Season
Peter Falk  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
['Product Description', '"Oh, there\'s just one more thing…." Everyone\'s favorite cigar-chomping, trenchcoat-wearing Police Lieutenant is back on DVD asking all the right questions in all 8 thrilling episodes of the Complete Second Season of Columbo. Join five-time Emmy winner Peter Falk as wry and ruffled Lieutenant Columbo as he solves L.A.\'s most puzzling crimes with his trademark wit and style. Along for the chase are a dazzling lineup of Hollywood\'s brightest stars including Robert Culp, Valerie Harper, Dean Stockwell, Leonard Nimoy, Martin Landau, Marc Singer and more. In the smart, funny and exciting Second Season of Columbo, it\'s no mystery to see why this is the DVD series that mystery lovers have been waiting for!', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', 'Armchair sleuths, get out your trenchcoats: Universal has released the sophomore season (1972-73) of the classic detective series', 'Columbo', ", starring Peter Falk as the sage but rumpled police lieutenant. As with the first season, there's plenty of star power in front of and behind the camera to abet Falk in these eight 90- and 120-minute episodes: John Cassavetes stars in the season premiere,", 'Etude in Black', ', as a philandering symphony conductor, with Blythe Danner and Hollywood legend Myrna Loy in support; Oscar winner Ray Milland is a scheming orchid grower in "The Greenhouse Jungle," co-starring Bradford Dillman and William Smith; Robert Culp and Dean Stockwell are a football team manager and owner, respectively, whose disagreements blossom into murder in "The Most Crucial Game"; and Jeanette Nolan offers stellar comic relief in "Double Shock," which features Martin Landau as identical twins--one of whom has murdered their uncle. Performances by Richard Basehart, Laurence Harvey, Leonard Nimoy, Anne Francis, Anne Baxter, and Mel Ferrer also highlight the season; direction by small-screen stalwarts like Boris Sagal, Jeremy Paul Kagan, and Nicholas Colasanto ("Coach" on', 'Cheers', ') and scripts by Stephen Bochco also bring quality and style to the proceedings. Sadly, no extras are available in this five-disc set, but the stellar image and sound quality (and lack of commercials) should appeal to series fans and newcomers alike.', '--Paul Gaita']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interest in Classic Television:** The user demonstrates a strong preference for classic detective series, particularly enjoying the "Columbo" franchise. The focus on vintage productions indicates an appreciation for nostalgia and timeless storytelling.
  
- **Value for Quality:** The user highly rated the DVD for its condition and performance, showing a preference for high-quality media regardless of whether it is new or used.

- **Enjoyment of Mystery and Suspense:** The user enjoys drama, mystery, and suspense genres, favoring content that engages critical thinking and problem-solving.

- **Celebration of Star Power:** The inclusion of notable actors and star-studded casts is likely a significant factor in the user's enjoyment of a series.

- **Positive Nostalgia:** The user expresses joy in rewatching favorite seasons, highlighting a tendency to revisit beloved content, which adds to their overall enjoyment.

- **High Ratings and Reviews:** The user maintains high standards for their media choices, indicated by a consistently positive rating for products that meet their preferences.

Overall, this initial interaction reveals a user who values classic, well-crafted television, appreciates quality in their media, and enjoys the intricacies of mystery storytelling.
